definitions.definition: To render a non- Sanskrit text , word , etc., in a form characteristic of Sanskrit morphology or phonology .
To influence a non-Sanskrit language by Sanskritic vocabulary .
To emulate rituals and practices of upper classes so as to gain upward social mobility .

main_definition: ( transitive , linguistics ) To render a non- Sanskrit text , word , etc., in a form characteristic of Sanskrit morphology or phonology .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , linguistics ) To influence a non-Sanskrit language by Sanskritic vocabulary .
( transitive , South Asia , Southeast Asia ) To emulate rituals and practices of upper classes so as to gain upward social mobility .
